message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $1400000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up!

I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to offer $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1300000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to my business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to get the best value for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $1320000 is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $1290000 for the product. I think this is the best we can do and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
